log.db_hash_generated: [DB] Database hash generated and saved at: {{configPath}}, please keep it safe!
log.db_hash_verify_failed: [DB] Hash verification failed, cannot access database: {{error}}

log.dc_font_missing: [INIT] System font missing, download additional font file?

log.dc_font_skipped: [INIT] Skipping font download, using system default font
log.dc_unzip_install: [INIT] Please install unzip using your system package manager
log.dc_install_complete: [INIT] Installation complete, please rerun the program
